markdown:
<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Standard">[Talisman Dabbler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=79)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 195 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

The classic idea of magic is that of a hoary wizard, poring over a crumbling book of spells. But magic is so much more than that—it is thought, will, and action, and with the right [talismans](/equipment/consumables/talismans), you can make even the cut of a sword a deeply magical act. This all hinges on the small magical talismans you affix to your gear. You know how to make and use the perfect talismans for any job.

<document level="2" id="feat-2079" />
